title: Open-source AI tool matches commercial systems in medical scan reporting
description: A new study from the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus shows that free, open-source artificial intelligence (AI) tools can help doctors report medical scans just as well as more expensive commercial systems without putting patient privacy at risk.

title: 'It's pure genius': Trump wants to rename 'artificial intelligence' because..
description: President Trump suggests renaming AI to "genius" at a major summit, unveiling his AI Action Plan to enhance US leadership in artificial intelligence.
content:

title: Trump admin unveils AI strategy to maintain US dominance
description: WASHINGTON, D.C. — The Trump administration on Wednesday unveiled an aggressive, low-regulation strategy boosting big tech's race to stay ahead of China on artificial intelligence and cement the United States' dominance in the fast-expanding field.

title: Helped by AI, man built bombs he planned to detonate in Manhattan, officials say
description: Federal prosecutors indicted a 55-year-old man Tuesday, alleging he built seven homemade bombs with the help of artificial intelligence, a process he called “easier than buying gun powder.”
content:
Federal prosecutors indicted a 55-year-old Long Island, New York, man Tuesday, alleging he built seven homemade bombs with the help of artificial intelligence, a process he called “easier than buying gun powder,” according to court documents.
